entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Manicouagan
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to light snow or periods of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Rain showers early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
